department.dept_long_name: Committee on Higher Degrees in Social Policy

course.title: Introduction to Social Policy Research
course.description: Required of and limited to first-year PhD students in Social Policy. Explores current issues in Social Policy research based on the Multidisciplinary Program in Inequality & Social Policy Seminar Series.
course.prerequisites: Limited to first-year PhD students in Social Policy.
course.notes: This course may be taken only for quarter credit.
